title: The Everyday Impacts of Diversity and Inclusion at Akamai
description: To me, Diversity & Inclusion means a new way of thinking and engaging with society. It seems to be one of the most popular phrases that every person sees on the internet every day. I have been appointed as an ambassador of D&I for Akamai?s Asia-Pacific Japan region, and have been learning the essential principles along with some of my colleagues for the past several months.
author: Hisashi Yamaguchi
